name: Land of Hexagods
description:
An online multiplayer game where the host is playing a world sandbox game where they are a god, and everyone else that joins is playing an adventure survival game within that world. Can you trust your host to be a benevolent god that helps you survive? Or is you're friend the one you actually have to worry about. There's no player limit so feel free to play with as many friends as you'd like.

Credits:

Artist of all the beautiful things in this game - https://daydreamstudio.itch.io/

Coder of the whole world system, multiplayer connectivity, inventory system, god player,  summoning circle, tool system, and more - https://lavalamp202.itch.io/

Coder of combat system, enemies, base human player, human player movement, sound system, and more - https://laelapz.itch.io/

Audio sources:

https://leohpaz.itch.io/rpg-essentials-sfx-free
